Text: Forgive me..for I am not worthy...but I have tried to load this in kontakt 4 and I can't figure it out. I got it to load as a library, but when kontakt got down to the root sample, I got an error that the samples are missing. Please explain how to set this up so it works...Thanks for the awesome DL's!!
I figured it out. I didn't have the sample folder merged with the rest of the folders, but I still get a missing files error on some sounds...maybe because I haven't DL'ed all the sample discs yet?

Hey i got everything installed and loaded into Kontakt...My only problem is when i go to load the samples it says " This patch is encrypted and cannot be loaded unless the respective library is registered properly"  Any help on the registration?

@SRXN...i had exact same problem.....could do with a proper installer......any out there???
Cheers for DL levitius......
This is only Disc 4 guys! Not sure where the others are, but this won't do much without the rest.
